original: Albertus, Halvar Mattias, apotekare, Linköping, f, 14/12/93 i Gävle. G. 2. 32 m. Stina Persson. Barn: Elisabet f. 20, Birgitta 22, Sixten 34. — Studrex. i Jönköp. 12, farm. kand. 15, stud. v. Sthlmsi högsik. 17, aman. åt prof. i bot. o. farmakognosi v. farm. inst. 17-18, apotrex. 19. Elev i AHngsås 12-14, anst. v. apot. Kronan i Jönköp. 15-17, Vakteln i Halmstad 19-21, förest, f. apot. i Kolsva 21-25, anst. v. apot. i Eslöv 25-27, v. Lejonet i Malmö 27-37, priv. å apot. i Degerfors 37, å apot. Vasen i Linköp. sed. 44, inneh. av fi-lialapot. Gyllene Axet i Linköp. Sekr. i sydsv. krets, av Sv. farmrförb. 35- 36, v. ordf. 37, fullm. f. samma krets 32 o. 36, suppl. i centrrstyr. 36-37, led. av st3^r. f. Värml.-Dals krets av Sv res apotrförb. 40-45, suppl. i Apotrsoc. direkt. 40, ord. led. sed. 43. Fd. tj r-grenschef f. gasskyddet i Degerfors. Skr.: ett antal art. i farmacevt. ämnen, bl. a. Iakttagelser fr. laborato-riearb. (33) o. Tablettberedningar (37). RVO, Apotekare Karl Ahlbergs MM 44.
translated: Albertus, Halvar Mattias, pharmacist, from Linköping, born on December 14, 1893 in Gävle. Married twice, the second marriage was to Stina Persson in 1932. Children: Elisabet, born in 1920, Birgitta in 1922, and Sixten in 1934. Completed studies in Jönköping in 1912, became a pharmacy graduate in 1915, and studied at the Stockholm University College of Pharmacy in 1917. Employed as an assistant to a professor of botany and pharmacognosy at the School of Pharmacy from 1917 to 1918. Became a pharmacist in 1919. Worked as a trainee in AHngsås from 1912 to 1914, and was employed at apot. Kronan in Jönköping from 1915 to 1917. Served at Vakteln in Halmstad from 1919 to 1921, was the director of apot. in Kolsva from 1921 to 1925, and was employed at apot. in Eslöv from 1925 to 1927. Worked at Lejonet in Malmö from 1927 to 1937, then privately at apot. in Degerfors in 1937, and became the owner of the Vasen pharmacy in Linköping since 1944. Held a position as secretary of the southern Swedish district of the Swedish Pharmaceutical Association from 1935 to 1936, vice chairman in 1937, and was a full member of the same district in 1932 and 1936. Was a member of the central board from 1936 to 1937, was a member of the board of the Värml.-Dals district of the Swedish Pharmaceutical Association from 1940 to 1945, and a substitute member of Apotrsoc. direkt. in 1940, and became an ordinary member since 1943. Former chief of the gas protection service in Degerfors. Wrote several articles on pharmaceutical topics, including "Observations from laboratory work" in 1933, and "Tablet preparations" in 1937. Awarded the RVO and the Karl Ahlberg Medal in 1944.
